page.title: 04 EDUCATION
page.content:
EDUCATION IN GOREBRIDGE
GREENHALL HIGH SCHOOL
IN GREENHALL THERE IS AN ASSEMBLY HALL, WITH STAGE,AND IS LARGE ENOUGH TO ACCOMODATE ALL THE PUPILS. MID-DAY MEALS ARE SUPPLIED FROM A WELL EQUIPPED KITCHEN. A COMMUNITY WING IS ON SITE AND IS USED BY THE SCHOOL DURING THE DAY AND BY THE LOCAL COMMUNITY AT NIGHT. IN THEIR FIRST TWO YEARS AT GREENHALL PUPILS FOLLOW A COMMON COURSE CONSISTING OF ENGLISH,MATHS,FRENCH, HISTORY,GEOGRAPHY,SCIENCE,ART.MUSIC, TECHNICHAL,HEALTH,RELIGIOUS,PHYSICAL, AND SOCIAL EDUCATION.IN YEARS 3 AND 4 PUPILS CAN DIVERSIFY IN THE SUBJECTS STUDIED,FOR INSTANCE,PHYSICS,ACCOUNT- ING,FOOD & NUTRITION,CHEMISTRY,GERMAN AND SECRETARIAL STUDIES MAY BE CHOSEN.
